sentences.english: Street-lamp lighting system is an essential part of public facility for city construction.

sentences.english: In turn, the cheaper lighting has led to higher overall energy use.
sentences.chinese: 反過來，更便宜的照明燈導致了使用能源總量的上升。

sentences.english: Use ornamental illume is relatively the choice of beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 使用裝飾性的照明是較佳的選擇。

sentences.english: Right now you're holding a parachute from a German flare in your hands.

sentences.english: The continuos high book shelf integrates lighting which position can be adjusted to the need.

sentences.english: It's the first city that was illuminated with electricity.

sentences.english: Our rooms are lighted with electric lams .

sentences.english: The performance of the human eye largely depends on the level of illuminance in the visual field.
sentences.chinese: 在視野中人類的眼睛表現大量地仰賴照明度的水平。

definition: electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
